Class SalesController

java.lang.Object
app.SalesController
public class SalesController extends Object
Controller class for managing the sales view for the POS system. This class handles all data reports and graphs, as well as being the first location when a manager logs in.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the scene by installing uniform scaling to match design height and width of all other scenes.

    • setConnection

      public void setConnection(Connection conn)
      Initializes database connection for this controller and sets up initial view of the charts and reports displayed in the scene.
      Parameters:
      conn - The current active Connection used to retrieve sales data

    • setUserCredentials

      public void setUserCredentials(String username, String password)
      Sets the user credentials to the employee currently logged in. This method stores the provided username and password for later use.
      Parameters:
      username - the username (email address) of the logged in employee
      password - the password of the logged in employee

    • switchScene

      public void switchScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String title) throws IOException
      Helper function used to switch scenes to different views.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent that triggers the scene change.
      title - The FXML file path that the scene is switching to.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file cannot be found or loaded.

      Throws:

    • exitProgram

      private void exitProgram()

    • installUniformScaling

      private static void installUniformScaling(javafx.scene.Scene scene, double designW, double designH)
      Installs uniform scaling to scene based off given design height and width.
      Parameters:
      scene - The Scene to scale.
      designW - The design width to scale to.
      designH - The design height to scale to.

    • viewXReport

      private void viewXReport()
      Generates and displays current X-Report of the day. The X-Report shows hourly sales, returns, voids, and payment methods.

    • enlargeXReport

      private void enlargeXReport()
      Enlarges or shrinks the X-Report when the button is pressed.

    • viewZReport

      private void viewZReport()
      Generate and displays current Z-Report of the day. The Z-Report shows a summary of all sales made during the day, and will mark the current day as reported after viewing the report.

    • queryDouble

      private double queryDouble(String sql) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL query that returns a double.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to be executed.
      Returns:
      The double value of the first column in first row of SQL query or 0.0 if none was found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • queryInt

      private int queryInt(String sql) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL query that returns an integer.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to be executed.
      Returns:
      The integer value of the first column in first row of SQL query or 0 if none was found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • onPickTimeFrame

      private void onPickTimeFrame()
      Updates top sellers label with the top 5 best-selling drinks based on the selected timeframe.

    • initTopSellersText

      private void initTopSellersText()
      Initializes the top sellers label with the top 5 best-selling drinks from the last day.

    • initSalesByHourChart

      private void initSalesByHourChart()
      Initializes the line chart for number of sales per hour of the day based off all-time sales.

    • initSalesByDayChart

      private void initSalesByDayChart()
      Initializes the bar chart for number of sales per day of the week based off all-time sales.

    • initInventoryLabel

      private void initInventoryLabel()
      Initializes the inventory label that displays current stock per category of inventory.

    • viewProductUsage

      private void viewProductUsage()
      Generates and displays the Product Usage report for the selected date range.
